  • Uses of User in server

    Methods in server that return User
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    User
    UserManager.getUser​(String username)
    Iterates through the ArrayList users and returns a user based on a search by username Multiple threads have access to this method and can run this method simultaneously and hence, this forEach-loop has to be synchronized
    User
    UserManager.getUserById​(int id)
    Iterates through the ArrayList users and returns a user based on a search by User ID Multiple threads have access to this method and can run this method simultaneously and hence, this forEach-loop has to be synchronized
    Methods in server that return types with arguments of type User
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    ArrayList<User>
    UserManager.getUsers()
    Returns an ArrayList users of User objects The section of the code below has to be synchronized because this method can be called as the change is/has been made
    ArrayList<User>
    UserFileManager.readUsers()
    Reads the file that stores the user data and constructs an arraylist of users from it
    Methods in server with parameters of type User
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    UserManager.addUser​(User user)
    Adds a User object to the ArrayList users This is synchronized because multiple threads could be trying to add the same user
    void
    UserManager.removeUser​(User user)
    Removes a User object from the ArrayList users This is synchronized because multiple threads could be trying to remove the same user
    Method parameters in server with type arguments of type User
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    UserManager.setUsers​(ArrayList<User> users)
    Set an ArrayList users of User objects Users can be accessed by multiple threads and thus has to be synchronized
